text: Peace Orji (born 20 December 1995) is Nigerian badminton player. She participated at the 2019 African Games and won the gold medal in the mixed team event and also a bronze medal in the mixed doubles. == Achievements == === African Games === Mixed doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font- size: 90%;" !
